casebody.data:
Bert BRANDER
v.
Trisha STODDARD, Temporary Administrator (Estate of Lily B. Frey), et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 25, 2017 Proloy K. Das, Sarah Gruber and Patrick E. Power, in support of the petition. John L. Laudati, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 730 , 164 A.3d 889 (2017), is denied.
